caption: Table 1: The absolute percentage increase in Pass Rate (PR) across various internal capability evaluation sets after optimization with Baichuan Alignment. description: Table 1 presents the absolute percentage increase in Pass Rate across various internal capabilities after applying Baichuan Alignment.
